divs: Sighting DetailsOver the west horizon four bright red balls of light rose straight up in a line straight up in the sky. They where floating up into the air almost like lanterns in the sky or like a tracer on a firework but it went up way to high to be that. My husband notice it first when he was unloading the car. They where so very bright. The neighbors came out and saw it as well. One neighbor said he saw the same thing the night prior.
trends: There have been 16 other sightings in Livonia
There was one other sighting in Livonia on or around June 13th 2010
